title: Independent Distro 4MLinux 43.0 Released with Linux 6.1 LTS, Thunderbird 115
description:
4MLinux 43.0 distribution is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.1 LTS and featuring LibreOffice 7.5, Thunderbird 115, Mesa 23.1, and many other updated components.

The post Independent Distro 4MLinux 43.0 Released with Linux 6.1 LTS, Thunderbird 115 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: GNOME Devs Are Working on a New Window Management System
description:
GNOME devs are envisioning a new, unconventional window management system for the GNOME desktop environment using a mosaic tiling behavior.

The post GNOME Devs Are Working on a New Window Management System appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
